game.name: Stickman Archer 3 2018
game.description:
The improved stickman archer is comparatively better than the previous one! Are you ready to show off your insane archery skills once again? Join Stickman Archer 3 and be prepared to take up arms once again using your arrow and bow! Oh my God! There is a wide range of never-ending foes to deal with. And, you are alone to take care of in this next instalment of the extremely engaging and popular stickman archery series. More blood and challenging archery gameplay to explore this time!
You have to work hard as your stickman has multiple enemy stickmen to shoot down in this brand new action game. Shoot as many opponents as you can with your arrow and bow to prove yourself as a new champion in the stickmen archery world! Choose from any option between archery mode and waves mode and gear up to take the enemies down before they shoot you! Be careful as you will die if your enemy stickman hit your body with only 2 arrows! A clear headshot can cause a life loss. 
Your victory will depend how fast you aim, shoot and hit your enemy standing on the other side. The best part is that you have multiple arrows to use at your disposal but make sure to aim precisely to send your enemies to the hell. Play against on AI and defeat your enemies like a pro in this HTML5 fighting game! Use stars to purchase new skins for your character while strengthen him with the help of some useful tools! Good luck to have a blast with your friends in this latest arcade version!
